subtitle: deep beneath the Desert Sands they
discovered what they believed to be the
long-lost Tomb of the mythical King
Gilgamesh the protagonist of the oldest
story human beings ever wrote The Epic
of Gilgamesh more importantly on the
outskirts of the ancient city was what
appeared to be a burial site which
archaeologists believed to be the Tomb
of the Ancient King
as Fassbender put it I don't want to say
definitely it was the grave of King
Gilgamesh but it looks very similar to
that described in the Epic
if the grave of Gilgamesh was similar to
that described in the Epic does that
mean that Fassbender and his team had
discovered a tomb with a body of a 17
foot tall Giant
it was quite simply a mind-blowing find
a long-lost missing piece of the origins
of human history
